DOC.detailed_description: Xenon-gas approve anesthetic EMEA use balance anesthesia combination opioids adult american society anesthesiology classification ASA ≤ III . Several clinical pre-clinical study show positive effect xenon several organ function brain , kidneys heart . In two study , enhance expression hypoxia inducible factor-1α ( HIF-1α ) could show animal kidney kidney cell . Interestingly , HIF-1α lead enhance formation erythropoetin ( EPO ) . This might result enhanced oxygen transport capacity enhance oxygen-level xenon-treatment . Aim project analyze effect xenon-inhalation circulate erythropoetin-level blood healthy volunteer randomize control pilot study . Besides , positive stimulating factor erythropoiesis ( HIFa stabilize factor ) growth factor ( fibroblast growth factor ( FGFs ) , hepatocyte growth factor ( HGF ) , mechano growth factor ( MGFs ) , platelet-derived growth factor ( PDGFs ) , vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGFs ) ) shall analyze .
